revised_title: Thermodynamics of Ternary Ion Exchange in Zeolites: Experimental Determination and Modeling
tldr: This article investigates the thermodynamics of ternary ion exchange in zeolites, focusing on the exchange of sodium, ammonium, and potassium ions in mordenite. The authors develop a thermodynamic model to predict multicomponent exchange equilibria and test it experimentally. The study provides insights into the non-ideality in the zeolite phase and its effects on ion selectivity and exchange equilibria.
